GV03sb_08_u:346: retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmādanayorvāyuḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:347: upadadhāti sarvatastadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato vāyuḥ sarvataḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:348: sarvatastatsamyañcaṃ vāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo
GV03sb_08_u:349: vāti diśyā anūpadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu vāyuḥ 8.2.3.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:353: pāhyapānam me pāhi vyānam me pāhi cakṣurma urvyā bibhāhi śrotram me
GV03sb_08_u:362: sarvatastadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato varṣati sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastamīcīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:363: vṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo varṣati vāyavyā
GV03sb_08_u:364: anūpadadhāti vāyau tadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmādyāṃ diśaṃ vāyureti tāṃ diśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:369: tatprāṇebhyo 'nnaṃ dadhātyapaḥ pinvauṣadhīrjinva dvipādava catuṣpātpāhi divo
GV03sb_08_u:381: tāngāyatrī cando bhūtvā vayasāpnottadyadgāyatryāpnodetaddhi canda āśiṣṭhaṃ sā
GV03sb_08_u:387: prajāpatirvai kṣatraṃ sa vayo 'bhavanmayaṃdaṃ canda iti yadvā
GV03sb_08_u:388: aniruktaṃ tanmayaṃdamanirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatireva cando 'bhavat 8.2.3.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:394: ityāpo vai prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī tā hi parame sthāne tiṣṭhanti prajāpatireva
GV03sb_08_u:397: catvāri vayāṃsi catvāri candāṃsi tadaṣṭāvaṣṭākṣarā gāyatryeṣā vai sā
GV03sb_08_u:398: gāyatrī yā tadbhūtvā prajāpatiretānpaśūnvayasāpnottasmājjīrṇam paśuṃ vayasāpta
GV03sb_08_u:399: ityācakṣate tasmādu sarvāsveva vayo vaya ityamuvartate 'tha ye 'smātte paśava
GV03sb_08_u:400: udakrāmannete te pañcadaśottare vajro vai paśavo vajraḥ pañcadaśastasmādyasya
GV03sb_08_u:401: paśavo bhavantyapaiva sa pāpmānaṃ hate vajro haiva tasya pāpmānamapahanti
GV03sb_08_u:402: tasmādyāṃ kāṃ ca diśam paśumāneti vajravihitāṃ haiva tāmanveti 8.2.4.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:403: basto vaya iti bastaṃ vayasāpnodvivalaṃ canda ityekapadā vai vivalaṃ canda ekapadā
GV03sb_08_u:406: vṛṣṇiṃ vayasāpnodviśālaṃ canda iti dvipadā vai viśālaṃ cando dvipadā
GV03sb_08_u:409: puruṣaṃ vayasāpnottandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ candaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:412: vyāghraṃ vayasāpnodanādhṛṣṭaṃ canda iti virāḍvā anādhṛṣṭaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:413: cando 'nnaṃ vai virāḍannamanādhṛṣṭaṃ virāḍṛ bhūtvā vyāghrā uccakramuḥ 8.2.4.[5]
GV03sb_08_u:415: siṃhaṃ vayasāpnoccadiścanda ityaticandā vai cadiścandaḥ sā hi sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:416: candāṃsi cādayatyaticandā ha bhūtvā siṃhā uccakramurathāto niruktāneva
GV03sb_08_u:419: paṣṭhavāhaṃ vayasāpnodbṛhatī canda iti bṛhatī ha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:425: ṛṣabhaṃ vayasāpnotsatobṛhatī canda iti satobṛhatī ha bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:431: dhenuṃ vayasāpnojjagatī canda iti jagatī ha bhūtvā dhenava
GV03sb_08_u:434: tryaviṃ vayasāpnottriṣṭupcanda iti triṣṭubbha bhūtvā tryavaya
GV03sb_08_u:437: dityavāhaṃ vayasāpnodvirāṭ canda iti virāḍa bhūtvā dityavāha
GV03sb_08_u:440: pañcāviṃ vayasāpnodgāyatrī canda iti gāyatrī ha bhūtvā pañcāvaya
GV03sb_08_u:450: 'tha cando vayasā ca hyenāṃścandasā ca parigatyātmannadhattātmannakuruta
GV03sb_08_u:451: tathaivainānayametadvayasā caiva candasā ca parigatyātmandhatta ātmankurute 8.2.4.[17]
GV03sb_08_u:454: purastādupadadhāti śiro 'sya tā atha yā dakṣiṇataścottarataśca sa ātmātha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:458: dakṣiṇata upadhāyottarata upadadhāti sārdhamayamātmā jāyātā ityatha paścātpucaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:462: madhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti tasmānmadhyam prati paśurvariṣṭho 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:463: ye vīryavattamāḥ paśavastāndakṣiṇata upadadhāti dakṣiṇaṃ tadardham
GV03sb_08_u:467: atha yadiha hrasiṣṭhānpaśūnupadadhāti teno etā aṇiṣṭhāḥ pūrvārdhaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:468: tajjaghanārdhaṃ ca paśoraṇiṣṭhau karoti tasmātpūrvārdhaśca jaghanārdhaśca
GV03sb_08_u:469: paśoraṇiṣṭhau tasmātpūrvārdhena ca jaghanārdhena ca paśurucca tiṣṭhati saṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:470: viśatyatha lokampṛṇe upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:473: etadvai devā dvitīyāṃ citiṃ citvā samārohanyadūrdhvam
GV03sb_08_u:475: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:476: cetayamānā antarikṣameva bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat 8.3.1.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:478: yuvaṃ na imāṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimupadhattamiti kiṃ nau tato
GV03sb_08_u:479: bhaviṣyatīti yuvameva naḥ śreṣṭhau bhaviṣyatha iti tatheti tebhya etāmindrāgnī
GV03sb_08_u:480: tṛtīyāṃ citimupādhattāṃ tasmādāhurindrāgnī eva devānāṃ śreṣṭhāviti 8.3.1.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:486: ādāya vyudakrāmaṃstasyendrāgnī ca viśvakarmā ca madhyamādāyotkamyātiṣṭhan 8.3.1.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:488: upa meta prati ma etaddhatta yena me yūyamudakramiṣṭeti kiṃ nastato
GV03sb_08_u:489: bhaviṣyatīti yuṣmaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:495: iṣṭakāṃ dṛṃhataṃ yuvamiti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:496: pṛṣṭhena dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ ca vibādhasa iti pṛṣṭhena hyeṣā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_08_u:504: vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_08_u:505: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:507: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetatsādayitvā
GV03sb_08_u:508: sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuratha sāma gāyati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.3.1.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:510: diśo vai diśyā diśa evaitadupadadhāti tadyābhirado
GV03sb_08_u:511: vāyurdigbhiranantarhitābhirupaittā etāstā evaitadupadadhāti tā u evāmūḥ
GV03sb_08_u:512: purastāddarbhastambaṃ ca logeṣṭakāścopadadhātyasau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:513: dikṣvadhyūhati dikṣu cinoti tā yattatraiva syurbahirdhā tatsyurbahirdho vā
GV03sb_08_u:514: etadyoneragnikarma yatpurā puṣkaraparṇāttā yadihāhṛtyopadadhāti tadenā yonau
GV03sb_08_u:515: puṣkaraparṇe pratiṣṭhāpayati tatho haitā abahirdhā bhavanti tā anantarhitāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:518: dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostaddiśo dadhāti tasmādanayordiśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:519: sarvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:522: candāṃsi vai diśo gāyatrī vai prācī diktraṣṭubdakṣiṇā
GV03sb_08_u:523: jagatī pratīcyanuṣṭubudīcī paṅktirūrdhvā paśavo vai candāṃsyantarikṣam
GV03sb_08_u:526: candāṃsi vai diśaḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:527: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā
GV03sb_08_u:528: upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhātyuttarā uttaraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:529: tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo
GV03sb_08_u:530: madhyata evāsminnetadannaṃ dadhāti sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnatadannaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:534: digadhipatnyasi bṛhatī digiti nāmānyāsāmetāni nāmagrāhamevainā etadupadadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:535: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hi diśaḥ 8.3.2.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:539: tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhya upadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu
GV03sb_08_u:542: prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:543: prajananamevaitadupadadhāti tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhyā upadadhāti dikṣu tatprajā
GV03sb_08_u:549: vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u vā etasmai
GV03sb_08_u:551: viśvaṃ jyotiryaceti sarvaṃ jyotiryacetyetadvāyuṣṭe 'dhipatiriti vāyumavāsyā adhipatiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:555: nabhasyaśca vārṣikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti dve
GV03sb_08_u:556: iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:559: athottare / iṣaścorjaśca śāradāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine
GV03sb_08_u:560: etadupadadhāti dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:564: tadyadetā / atropadadhāti saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:570: madhyameva madhyamā citirmadhyamasya varṣāśaradāvṛtū tadyadetā atropadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:572: tā vā etāḥ / catasra ṛtavyā madhyamāyāṃ citā upadadhāti dve-dve itarāsu citiṣu
GV03sb_08_u:573: catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'ntarikṣam madhyamā citirantarikṣe tatpaśūndadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:575: yadveva catasraḥ catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'nnam paśavo madhyam madhyamā
GV03sb_08_u:581: paśureṣa yadagnirmadhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:583: tā vā etāḥ / catasra ṛtavyāstāsāṃ viśvajyotiḥ pañcamī pañca diśyāstaddaśa daśākṣarā
GV03sb_08_u:584: virāḍannaṃ virāṇmadhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:585: anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:588: prāṇā vai prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇānevaitadupadadhāti tā daśa
GV03sb_08_u:589: bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ pūrvārdha upadadhāti purastāddhīme prāṇā āyurme pāhi
GV03sb_08_u:590: jyotirme yaceti prāṇo vai jyotiḥ prāṇam me yacetyevaitadāha tā anantarhitā ṛtavyābhya
GV03sb_08_u:591: upadadhāti prāṇo vai vāyurṛtuṣu tadvāyum pratiṣṭhāpayati 8.3.3.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:602: dvādaśākṣarā vai jagatī paśavo vai jagatyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:603: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadanna dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ prāṇabhṛdbhya
GV03sb_08_u:607: ayaṃ vai loko māyaṃ hi loko mita iva pramā canda ityantarikṣaloko
GV03sb_08_u:608: vai pramāntarikṣaloko hyasmāllokātpramita iva pratimā canda ityasau vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:610: lokeṣvannaṃ tadasrīvayo 'tho yadebhyo lokebhyo 'nnaṃ sravati tadasrīvayo 'thāto
GV03sb_08_u:613: uṣṇikcando bṛhatī cando 'nuṣṭupcando virāṭ cando gāyatrī
GV03sb_08_u:614: candastriṣṭupcando jagatī canda ityetāni niruktāni virāḍaṣṭamāni
GV03sb_08_u:615: candāṃsyupadadhāti pṛthivī cando 'ntarikṣaṃ canda iti yānyetaddevatyāni candāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:622: niruktāni cāniruktāni copadadhāti tasmānniruktamannamadyamānaṃ na kṣīyate 8.3.3.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:625: vai sā bṛhatī yāṃ taddevā antarikṣam bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstasyā etasyai devā
GV03sb_08_u:632: bhūtāni vyudakrāmannetāstā iṣṭakāstadyadetā upadadhāti yānyevāsmāttāni bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:636: virāḍannaṃ virāḍannamu candramā atha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadardhamāsāśca te
GV03sb_08_u:637: māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāścandramā vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:645: yadvālakhilyā nāma yadvā urvarayorasambhinnam bhavati khila iti vai tadācakṣate
GV03sb_08_u:655: śiro grīvā yadūrdhvaṃ nābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:658: sapta vā ime paścātprāṇāścatvāryūrvaṣṭhīvāni dvai pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:659: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:662: dhruvāsi dharuṇā dhartryasi dharaṇī yantrī rāḍyantryasi yamanī
GV03sb_08_u:670: dharaṇītyamuṃ dharaṇītyamuṃ lokamāyuṣe tvā varcase tvā kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya
GV03sb_08_u:675: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:679: dharitrītīmaṃ lokamiṣe tvorje tvā rayyai tvā poṣāya tveti catvāraścatuṣpādāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:685: 'nuvākastadantarikṣaṃ sa ātmā tadyattā ekādaśa bhavantyekādaśākṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:686: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣamatha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ sa vāyuḥ sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ
GV03sb_08_u:689: śiro 'sya tāstā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ prāṇā u vai
GV03sb_08_u:692: yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasya tā atha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:693: paścādyadūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyā avācīnam madhyāttadasya tāḥ pratiṣṭhaivottarataḥ 8.3.4.[14]
GV03sb_08_u:701: sa eṣa vāyuḥ prajāpatirasmiṃstraiṣṭubhe 'ntarikṣe samantam paryaknastadyattṛtīyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:702: citimupadadhāti vāyuṃ caiva tadantarikṣaṃ ca saṃkkṛtyopadhatte 'tha lokampṛṇe
GV03sb_08_u:703: upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.4.1.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:707: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:711: tvāmihopadadhāmahā iti kim me tato bhaviṣyatīti tvameva naḥ
GV03sb_08_u:712: śreṣṭham bhaviṣyasīti tatheti te 'tra brahmopādadhata tasmādāhurbrahmaiva
GV03sb_08_u:713: devānāṃ śreṣṭhamiti tadetayā vai caturthyā cityeme dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe brahma
GV03sb_08_u:714: vai caturthī citistasmādāhurbrahmaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe iti stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:715: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai brahma brahmaivaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:718: iti tatheti sa vai nābravītkim me tato bhaviṣyatīti yadu ha kiṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:720: putreṣvicate kimasmākaṃ tato bhaviṣyatītyevāhuratha yatputrāḥ pitari
GV03sb_08_u:721: tathetyevāhaivaṃ hi tadagre prajāpatiśca devāśca samavadanta stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:722: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatimevaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[5]
GV03sb_08_u:724: ye vai te prāṇā ṛṣaya etāṃ caturthīṃ citimapaśyanye ta
GV03sb_08_u:725: etena rasenopāyaṃsta ete tānevaitadupadadhāti stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:732: upa mehi prati ma etaddhehi yena me tvamudakramīriti kim me tato
GV03sb_08_u:733: bhaviṣyatīti tvaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:738: stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇāu vai vāyurvāyumevaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:741: tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi stomānāmāśiṣṭho 'tho vāyurvā āśustrivṛtsa eṣu triṣu
GV03sb_08_u:742: lokeṣu vartate tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi sarveṣām bhūtānāmāśiṣṭho vāyurha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:745: ya eva pañcadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:746: bhānta iti vajro vai bhānto vajraḥ pañcadaśo 'tho candramā vai bhāntaḥ pañcadaśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:747: sa ca pañcadaśāhānyāpūryate pañcadaśāpakṣīyate tadyattamāha bhānta iti bhāti hi
GV03sb_08_u:748: candramāścandramā ha bhūtvā dakṣiṇatastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:750: ya eva saptadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:751: vyometi prajāpatirvai vyomā prajāpatiḥ saptadaśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva vyomā
GV03sb_08_u:752: saptadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastadyattamāha vyometi vyomā hi
GV03sb_08_u:753: saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro ha bhūtvottaratastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:755: ya evaikaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:756: iti pratiṣṭhā vai dharuṇaḥ pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśo 'tho asau vā ādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:757: ekaviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā asāvevādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:758: ekaviṃśastadyattamāha dharuṇa iti yadā hyevaiṣo 'stametyathedaṃ sarvaṃ dhriyata
GV03sb_08_u:759: ādityo ha bhūtvā paścāttasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhātyatha
GV03sb_08_u:762: ya evāṣṭādaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:763: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva
GV03sb_08_u:764: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastadyattamāha pratūrtiriti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratirati
GV03sb_08_u:767: ya eva navadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro tapo
GV03sb_08_u:768: navadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva tapo navadaśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:769: tapa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni tapati tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[15]
GV03sb_08_u:771: ya eva saviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vā
GV03sb_08_u:772: abhīvartaḥ saviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara evābhīvartaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:773: saviṃśastadyattamāhābhīvarta iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhivartate tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:776: ya eva dvāviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:777: varco dvāviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva varco
GV03sb_08_u:778: dvāviṃśastadyattamāha varca iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:780: sambharaṇastrayoviṃśa iti ya eva trayoviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:781: vāva sambharaṇastrayoviṃsastasya trayodaśa māsā sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:782: eva sambharaṇastrayoviṃśastadyattamāha sambharaṇa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:785: ya eva caturviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:789: ya eva pañcaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:790: vāva garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ saṃvatsara eva garbhāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:791: pañcaviṃśastadyattamāha garbhā iti saṃvatsaro ha trayodaśo māso garbho bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:794: ya eva triṇava stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāhauja iti v/jro vā
GV03sb_08_u:795: ojo vajrastriṇavo 'tho saṃvatsaro vā ojastriṇavastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dve
GV03sb_08_u:796: ahorātre saṃvatsara evaujastriṇavastadyattamāhauja iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām
GV03sb_08_u:799: ya evaikatriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:801: kraturekatriṃśastadyattamāha kraturiti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni karoti tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:804: ya eva trayastriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:805: pratiṣṭheti pratiṣṭhā hi trayastriṃśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśastasya
GV03sb_08_u:806: caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ ṣadṛtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:807: trayastriṃśastadyattamāha pratiṣṭheti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:811: saṃvatsaro vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ sapta
GV03sb_08_u:812: 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:813: bradhnasya viṣṭapamiti svārājyaṃ vai bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ svārājya
GV03sb_08_u:816: ya eva ṣaṭtriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:817: nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāstadyattamāha nāka iti na
GV03sb_08_u:818: hi tatra gatāya kasmai canākam bhavatyatho saṃvatsaro vāva nākaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:823: sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre tadyattamāha vivarta iti saṃvatsarāddhi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:826: ya eva catuṣṭoma stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:827: dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai dhartram pratiṣṭhā catuṣṭomo 'tho vāyurvāva dhartraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:828: catuṣṭomaḥ sa ābhiścatasṛbhirdigbhi stute tadyattamāha dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai
GV03sb_08_u:829: dhartraṃ vāyuru sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti sa vai
GV03sb_08_u:830: vāyumeva prathamamupadadhāti vāyumuttamaṃ vāyunaiva tadetāni sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:832: tā vā etāḥ / aṣṭādaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti tau dvau trivṛtau prāṇo vai trivṛdvāyuru prāṇo
GV03sb_08_u:835: aṣṭādaśo vai saṃvatsaro dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:840: garbhyabhavattānyasya garbha eva santi pāpmā mṛtyuragṛhṇāt 8.4.2.[2]
GV03sb_08_u:842: yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇavānīti
GV03sb_08_u:843: kiṃ nastato bhaviṣyatīti vṛṇīdhvamityabravīttam bhāgo no 'stvityeke
GV03sb_08_u:846: bhāgamekebhyaḥ kṛtvādhipatyamekebhyaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti
GV03sb_08_u:849: dīkṣāyā ādhipatyamiti vāgvai dīkṣāgnaye bhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāca
GV03sb_08_u:850: ādhipatyamakarodbrahma spṛtaṃ trivṛtstoma iti brahma prajānāṃ trivṛtā stomena
GV03sb_08_u:854: ādhipatyamakarotkṣatraṃ spṛtam pañcadaśa stoma iti kṣatram prajānām
GV03sb_08_u:857: dhāturādhipatyamiti devā vai nṛcakṣaso devebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:858: kṛtvā dhātra ādhipatyamakarojjanitraṃ spṛtaṃ saptadaśa stoma iti viḍvai janitraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:859: viśam prajānāṃ saptadaśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:861: varuṇasyādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:862: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:863: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[7]
GV03sb_08_u:865: rudrāṇāmādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:866: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:867: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:870: ādhipatyamakarodgarbhā spṛtāḥ pañcaviṃśa stoma iti garbhānprajānām pañcaviṃśena
GV03sb_08_u:873: pūṣṇaṃ ādhipatyamitīyaṃ vā aditirasyai bhāgaṃ kṛtvā pūṣṇa
GV03sb_08_u:874: ādhipatyamakarodoja spṛtaṃ triṇava stoma ityojaḥ prajānāṃ triṇavena stomena
GV03sb_08_u:878: bṛhaspataya ādhipatyamakarotsamīcīrdiśa spṛtāścatuṣṭoma stoma iti sarvā diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:882: ayavāste hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yuvate cāyuvate ca pūrvapakṣebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:883: kṛtvāparapakṣebhya ādhipatyamakarotprajā spṛtāścatuścatvāriṃśa stoma iti sarvāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:887: viśvebhyo devebhya ādhipatyamakarodbhūtaṃ spṛtaṃ trayastriṃśa stoma iti sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:888: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇottathaivaitadyajamānaḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:889: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti 8.4.2.[13]
GV03sb_08_u:892: prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataiva tadetāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:896: sahasyaśca haimantikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:897: dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti 8.4.2.[15]
GV03sb_08_u:905: yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasyaiṣā caturthī citistadvasya hemanta
GV03sb_08_u:912: yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāḥ prajāḥ prajanayānīti te vai kena stoṣyāmaha
GV03sb_08_u:913: iti mayā caiva yuṣmābhiśceti tatheti te prāṇaiścaiva prajāpatinā cāstuvata yadu ha kiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:914: ca devāḥ kurvate stomenaiva tatkurvate yajño vai stomo yajñenaiva tatkurvate
GV03sb_08_u:917: vāgvā ekā vācaiva tadastuvata prajā adhīyanteti prajā atrādhīyanta
GV03sb_08_u:920: trayo vai prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno vyānastaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:928: ya eveme sapta śīrṣanprāṇāstaireva tadastuvata sapta ṛṣayo
GV03sb_08_u:931: nava vai prāṇāḥ sapta śīrṣannavāñcau dvau taireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:937: daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā trayodaśastenaiva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:938: māsā asṛjyanteti māsā atrāsṛjyanta saṃvatsaro 'dhipatirāsīditi saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:946: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptadaśaṃ tenaiva tadastuvata grāmyāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti grāmyāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:949: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo nava prāṇāstaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:953: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā ātmaikaviṃśastenaiva
GV03sb_08_u:957: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā
GV03sb_08_u:958: trayoviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata kṣudrāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti kṣudrāḥ paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:965: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyāścatvāryaṅgāni dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:966: ātmā saptaviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata dyāvāpṛthivī vyaitāmiti dyāvāpṛthivī atra vyaitāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:967: vasavo rudrā ādityā anuvyāyanniti vasavo rudrā ādityā atrānuvyāyaṃsta evādhipataya
GV03sb_08_u:970: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā nava prāṇāstaireva
GV03sb_08_u:974: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:975: ātmaikatriṃśastenaiva tadastuvata prajā asṛjyanteti prajā atrāsṛjyanta
GV03sb_08_u:978: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:982: tā vā etāḥ / saptadaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti saptadaśo vai saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:983: prajanayitā tadetena vai saptadaśena saṃvatsareṇa prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:986: prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ prajanayati tāḥ sṛṣṭvātmanprapādayate
GV03sb_08_u:987: retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:988: prajāḥ prapādayati sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnetāḥ prajāḥ prapādayati 8.4.4.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:994: mṛtyurasīdadimāmata upadhāsyate tamatra grahīṣyāmīti tam prāpaśyattam
GV03sb_08_u:1002: pañcadaśavatyāṃ saptadaśavatīṃ saptadaśavatyām pañcadaśavatīṃ tā yadevaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1003: vyatihāramupadadhāti tasmādakṣṇayāstomīyā atho yadete stomā ato 'nyathānupūrvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1004: tasmādvevākṣṇayāstomīyā atho evaṃ devā upādadhatetarathāsurāstato devā
GV03sb_08_u:1005: abhavanparāsurā bhavatyātmanā parāsya dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda 8.4.4.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:1007: so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasya trivṛdvatyāveva śiraste
GV03sb_08_u:1008: yattrivṛdvatyau bhavatastrivṛddhi śiro dve bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiraḥ pūrvārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1011: te yadekaviṃśavatyau bhavataḥ pratiṣṭhā hyekaviṃśo dve
GV03sb_08_u:1012: bhavato dvandvaṃ hi pratiṣṭhā paścādupadadhāti paścāddhīyam pratiṣṭhā 8.4.4.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1014: te yatpañcadaśavatyau bhavataḥ pañcadaśau hi bāhū dve
GV03sb_08_u:1015: bhavato dvau hīmau bāhū pārśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū 8.4.4.[7]
GV03sb_08_u:1017: te yatsaptadaśavatyau bhavataḥ saptadaśaṃ hyannaṃ dve
GV03sb_08_u:1023: sa ātmā tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1024: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyato hyayamātmā sarvata upadadhāti sarvato
GV03sb_08_u:1025: hyayamātmātha yadato 'nyadatiriktaṃ tadyadvai devānāmatiriktaṃ candāṃsi tāni
GV03sb_08_u:1026: tadyāni tāni candāṃsi paśavaste tadye te paśavaḥ puṇyāstā lakṣmyastadyāstāḥ puṇyā
GV03sb_08_u:1027: lakṣmyo 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa āsāmeṣa dakṣiṇataḥ 8.4.4.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1030: te hanū yāḥ ṣaṭ sā jihveti na tathā kuryādati te recayanti yathā pūrvayorhanvorapare
GV03sb_08_u:1034: asau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityametasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1035: diśi dadhma iti na tathā kuryādanyāni vāva tāni karmāṇi yairetamatra dadhāti 8.4.4.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:1038: tasmādyasya dakṣiṇato lakṣma bhavati tam puṇyalakṣmīka ityācakṣata uttarata
GV03sb_08_u:1039: striyā uttarataāyatanā hi strī tattatkṛtameva purastāttvevainā upadadhyādyatrāhaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1040: śirastadeva hanū tajjihvāthaitāḥ puṇyā lakṣmīrmukhato dhatte tasmādyasya mukhe
GV03sb_08_u:1049: sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.5.1.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:1053: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:1054: cetayamānā divameva virājam pañcamīṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat 8.5.1.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:1057: tajjānīta yathemaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ karavāmahā iti te
GV03sb_08_u:1065: sarvata evaitadetaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ kurute parārdha upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1068: eṣā vai sā virāḍyāṃ taddevā virājam pañcamīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1069: citimapaśyaṃstā daśa-daśopadadhāti daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā civiḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:1070: upadadhāti yo vā ekasyāṃ diśi virājati na vai sa virājati yo vāva sarvāsu dikṣu virājati
GV03sb_08_u:1074: sarvataḥ pāpmopāyatata sa etā iṣṭakā apaśyadasapatnāstā upādhatta tābhistam
GV03sb_08_u:1075: pāpmānamapāhata pāpmā vai sapatnastadyadetābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ sapatnamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1078: yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nvimaṃ sa pāpmā nopayatate
GV03sb_08_u:1079: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho ya eva pāpmā yaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1081: asapatnāḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evaitatpāpmānaṃ sapatnamapahate parārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1084: agne jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_08_u:1085: bandhuratha paścātsahasā jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 8.5.1.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1092: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣaṃ catasro diśa eṣa eva vajraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1093: pañcadaśastasyāsāvevādityaḥ ṣoḍaśī vajrasya bhartā sa etena pañcadaśena
GV03sb_08_u:1094: vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhā dakṣiṇataḥ pāpmānamapāhata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena
GV03sb_08_u:1097: catuścatvāriṃśa stomo varco draviṇamiti catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1098: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubho vajraḥ sa etena catuścatvāriṃśena vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhottarataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1102: agneḥ purīṣamasīti brahma vai caturthī citiragniru vai brahma tasyā
GV03sb_08_u:1107: dakṣiṇataudyāmo hi vajro 'ntareṇa dakṣiṇāṃ diśyāmudyāmāya ha tamavakāśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1114: tau bāhū sa yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmāsīdbāhubhyāṃ tamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1115: tathaivaitadyajamāno yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmā bhavati bāhubhyāmeva tamapahate 8.5.1.[16]
GV03sb_08_u:1121: yadapāniti tena taṃ yaḥ paścādatha yadbāhubhyāṃ karma kurute tena taṃ yo 'bhito
GV03sb_08_u:1122: 'tha yadannamatti tena taṃ ya upariṣṭātsarvadā ha vā evaṃvitpāpmānamapahate 'pi
GV03sb_08_u:1123: svapaṃstasmādevaṃ viduṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kīrtayennedasya pāpmāsānīti 8.5.2.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:1128: prāyacannetāścandasyāḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavastānyasmā acadayaṃstāni
GV03sb_08_u:1135: ayaṃ vai loka evaścando varivaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai varivaścandaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1136: śambhūścanda iti dyaurvai śambhūścandaḥ paribhūścanda iti diśo vai paribhūścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1137: ācaccanda ityannaṃ vā ācaccando manaścanda iti p rajāpatirvai manaścando
GV03sb_08_u:1140: prāṇo vai sindhuścandaḥ samudraścanda iti mano vai
GV03sb_08_u:1141: samudraścandaḥ sariraṃ canda iti vāgvai sariraṃ candaḥ kakupcanda iti prāṇo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1142: kakupcandastrikakupcanda ityudāno vai trikakupcandaḥ kāvyaṃ canda iti trayī vai
GV03sb_08_u:1143: vidyā kāvyaṃ cando 'ṅkupaṃ canda ityāpo vā aṅkupaṃ cando 'kṣarapaṅktiścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1144: ityasau vai loko 'kṣarapaṅktiścandaḥ padapaṅktiścanda ityayaṃ vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1145: padapaṅktiścando viṣṭārapaṅktiścanda iti diśo vai viṣṭārapaṅktiścandaḥ kṣuro
GV03sb_08_u:1146: bhrajaścanda ityasau vā ādityaḥ kṣuro bhrajaścanda ācaccandaḥ pracaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1149: rātrirvai saṃyaccando viyaccanda ityaharvai viyaccando bṛhaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1150: ityasau vai loko bṛhaccando rathantaraṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko rathantaraṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:1151: nikāyaścanda iti vāyurvai nikāyaścando vivadhaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1152: vivadhaścando giraścanda ityannaṃ vai giraścando bhrajaścanda ityagnirvai
GV03sb_08_u:1154: vāganuṣṭupcanda evas=cando varivaścanda iti tasyokto bandhuḥ 8.5.2.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1156: annaṃ vai vayaścando vayaskṛccanda ityagnirvai vayaskṛccando
GV03sb_08_u:1157: viṣpardhāścanda ityasau vai loko viṣpardhāścando viśālaṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_08_u:1158: viśālaṃ candaścadiścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai cadiścando dūrohaṇaṃ canda ityasau vā
GV03sb_08_u:1159: ādityo dūrohaṇaṃ candastandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ cando 'ṅkāṅkaṃ canda
GV03sb_08_u:1163: dvitīyodānastṛtīyodānaścaturthī vyānaḥ pañcamī prāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhī prāṇaḥ saptamī
GV03sb_08_u:1164: vyāno 'ṣṭamyudāno navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1169: pañcamyagniḥ ṣaṣṭhyagniḥ saptamī vāyuraṣṭamyādityo navamī yajamāna evātra
GV03sb_08_u:1170: daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ virājyadhūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhito devatāmayyāmarvācīśca
GV03sb_08_u:1175: saptamyantarikṣamaṣṭamī dyaurnavamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna
GV03sb_08_u:1180: hemantaścaturthī varṣāḥ pañcamī grīṣmaḥ ṣaṣṭhī grīṣmaḥ saptamī varṣā
GV03sb_08_u:1181: aṣṭamī hemanto navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1182: virājyadhyūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhita ṛtumayyāmarvācīśca parācīścopadadhāti tasmādeta ṛtavo
GV03sb_08_u:1185: yāḥ purastādupadadhāti prāṇāste tā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1188: etāstā devatā agniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca
GV03sb_08_u:1193: māsāste vāsantikau dvau graiṣmau dvau vārṣikau dvau śāradau
GV03sb_08_u:1196: yā prathamā daśadayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyāntarikṣaṃ tadyā tṛtīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1197: dyauḥ semameva lokam prathamayā daśatārohannantarikṣaṃ dvitīyayā divaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1198: tṛtīyayā tathaivaitadyajamāna imameva lokam prathamayā daśatā rohatyantarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1201: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:1203: yottamā daśadayaṃ sa lokastasmādyathaiva prathamāyai daśataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1210: 'smādudacikramiṣattamabravītkathotkrāmasi kathā mā jahāsīti sa vai me 'syānnasya
GV03sb_08_u:1211: rasam prayaceti tena vai mā saha prapadyasveti tatheti tasmā etasyānnasya rasam
GV03sb_08_u:1215: atha yaḥ so 'nnasya rasa etāstā stomabhāgā atha yaḥ sa indro 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1216: eva stomo yaddhi kiṃ ca stuvata etameva tena stuvanti tasmā etasmai stomāyaitam
GV03sb_08_u:1219: eṣa vai raśmirannaṃ raśmiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:1220: saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate pretinā dharmaṇā dharmaṃ jinvetyeṣa vai pretirannam
GV03sb_08_u:1221: pretiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate 'nvityā divā divaṃ jinvetyeṣa vā
GV03sb_08_u:1222: anvitirannamanvitiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate tadyadyadetadāha
GV03sb_08_u:1226: etadvai devā virājaṃ citiṃ citvā samārohaṃste
GV03sb_08_u:1228: svargaṃ lokamapaśyaṃstamupādadhata sa yaḥ sa nākaḥ svargo loka etāstā
GV03sb_08_u:1231: ayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyā antarikṣaṃ tadyāstṛtīyā dyauḥ sā
GV03sb_08_u:1232: yāścaturthyaḥ prācī sā digyāḥ pañcamyo dakṣiṇā sā yāḥ ṣaṣṭhyaḥ pratīcī sā yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1234: tā vā etāḥ / ekaviṃśatiriṣṭakā ime ca lokā diśaśceme ca vai lokā diśaśca pratiṣṭheme
GV03sb_08_u:1240: taddhaike / veṣaśrīḥ kṣatrāya kṣatraṃ jinveti triṃśattamīmupadadhati
GV03sb_08_u:1241: triṃśadakṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā citiriti na tathā kuryādati te
GV03sb_08_u:1243: virāḍindrāya ha ta indraloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1244: kurvantīndramindralokānnudante yajamāno vai sve yajña indro yajamānāya ha te
GV03sb_08_u:1245: yajamānaloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ kurvanti yajamānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1246: yajamānalokānnudante yaṃ vā etamagnimāharantyeṣa eva yajamāna āyatanenaiṣa u
GV03sb_08_u:1249: vāgvā aṣāḍhā rasa eṣa vāci tadrasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1252: iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhāsāvāditya stomabhāgā amuṃ tadādityamasyām
GV03sb_08_u:1255: iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhā hṛdayaṃ stomabhāgā asyāṃ taddhṛdayam mano
GV03sb_08_u:1256: dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ hṛdayena manasā cetayate sarvata upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1257: sarvatastaddhṛdayam mano dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ sarvato hṛdayena manasā cetayate
GV03sb_08_u:1258: 'tho puṇyā haitā lakṣmyastā etatsarvato dhatte tasmādyasya sarvato lakṣma bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1261: annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣa tametattiraḥ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:1264: annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣo 'nnaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃtanoti
GV03sb_08_u:1267: hṛdayaṃ vai stomabhāgāḥ purītatpurīṣaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatpurītatā
GV03sb_08_u:1271: tadyāścatasraḥ prathamāścitayaste catvāra ṛtavo 'tha stomabhāgā upadhāya purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1272: nivapati sā pañcamī citiḥ sa pañcama ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:1273: tadāhuḥ / yallokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokampṛṇāmupadadhāti kātra
GV03sb_08_u:1274: lokampṛṇetyasau vā ādityo lokampṛṇaiṣa u eṣā citiḥ saiṣā svayaṃ lokampṛṇā citiratha
GV03sb_08_u:1275: yadata ūrdhvamā purīṣātsā ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ sa ṣaṣṭha ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1278: prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti sā saptamī citiḥ sa saptama ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[10]
GV03sb_08_u:1280: yaddhi vikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā ca ṣaṣṭhyā eva tacciteḥ 8.5.4.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:1282: yajuṣānyāsu purīṣaṃ nivapati tūṣṇīmatra tenaiṣā na citiratho
GV03sb_08_u:1283: lokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokanpṛṇāmupadhāti teno evaiṣā na citiḥ 8.5.4.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:1286: etāstisrastadantarikṣaṃ tadvā idamekamivaivāntarikṣaṃ tā evaṃ tisra evam pañcaivaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1289: devā vai nākasado 'traiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sa eṣo 'tra
GV03sb_08_u:1290: nākaḥ svargo lokastasmindevā asīdaṃstadyadetasminnāke svarge loke devā
GV03sb_08_u:1294: etadvai devā etaṃ nākaṃ svargaṃ lokamapaśyannetā
GV03sb_08_u:1295: stomabhāgāste 'bruvannupa tajjānīta yathāsminnāke svarge loke sīdāmeti te
GV03sb_08_u:1299: etā iṣṭakā apaśyannākasadastā upādadhata tābhiretasminnāke svarge
GV03sb_08_u:1304: diśo vai sa nākaḥ svargo lokaḥ svarga evainā etalloke
GV03sb_08_u:1305: sādayatyṛtavyānāṃ velayā saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svarga evainā
GV03sb_08_u:1306: etalloke sādayatyantastomabhāgameṣa vai sa nākaḥ svargo lokastasminnevainā
GV03sb_08_u:1309: rājñyati prācī digiti rājñī ha nāmaiṣā prācī digvasavaste
GV03sb_08_u:1310: devā adhipataya iti vasavo haitasya diśo devā adhipatayo 'gnirhetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1311: pratidhartetyagnirhaivātra haitīnām pratidhartā trivṛttvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1312: trivṛtā haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritājyamukthamavyathāyai stabhnātvityājyena
GV03sb_08_u:1313: haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā rathantaraṃ sāma pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti
GV03sb_08_u:1314: rathantareṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā prathamajā deveṣviti prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:1315: vā ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāstaddhi brahma prathamajaṃ divo mātrayā varimṇā prathantviti
GV03sb_08_u:1316: yāvatī dyaustāvatīṃ varimṇā prathantvityetadvidhartā cāyamadhipatiśceti vākca tau
GV03sb_08_u:1317: manaśca tau hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vidhārayataste tvā sarve saṃvidānā nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge
GV03sb_08_u:1318: loke yajamānaṃ ca sādayantviti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 8.6.1.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1320: virāḍasi dakṣiṇā digiti virāḍḍha nāmaiṣā dakṣiṇā digrudrāste
GV03sb_08_u:1321: devā adhipataya iti rudrā haitasya diśo devā adhipataya indro hetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1322: pratidhartetīndro haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā pañcadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1323: śrayatviti pañcadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā praugamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1324: stabhnātviti praugeṇa haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā bṛhatsāma
GV03sb_08_u:1325: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti bṛhatā haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1328: samrāḍasi pratīcī digiti samrāḍḍha nāmaiṣā pratīci digādityāste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1329: adhipataya ityādityā haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo varuṇo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1330: varuṇo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā saptadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1331: saptadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā marutvatīyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1332: stabhnātviti marutvatīyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vairūpaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1333: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairūpeṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1335: athottarataḥ svarāḍasyudīcī digiti svarāḍḍha nāmaiṣodīcī diṅmarutaste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1336: adhipataya iti maruto haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayaḥ somo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1337: somo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartaikaviṃśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1338: śrayatvityekaviṃśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā niṣkevalyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1339: stabhnātviti niṣkevalyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vai rājaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1340: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairājena haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1343: adhipatnyasi bṛhatī digityadhipatnī ha nāmaiṣā bṛhatī digviśve te
GV03sb_08_u:1344: devā adhipataya iti viśve haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo bṛhaspatirhetīnā
GV03sb_08_u:1345: pratidharteti bṛhaspatirhaivātra hetīnām pratidhartā triṇavatrayastriṃśau tvā stomau
GV03sb_08_u:1346: pṛthivyāṃ śrayatāmiti triṇavatrayastriṃśābhyāṃ haiṣā stomābhyām pṛthivyāṃ śritā
GV03sb_08_u:1348: haiṣokthābhyāmavyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā śākvararaivate sāmanī pratiṣṭhityā
GV03sb_08_u:1349: antarikṣa iti śākvararaivatābhyāṃ haiṣā sāmabhyām pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1352: yajña u devānāmātmā yajñameva taddevā ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1356: yajño vai nākasado yajña u eva pañcacūḍāstadya ime
GV03sb_08_u:1357: catvāra ṛtvijo gṛhapatipañcamāste nākasado hotrāḥ pañcacūḍā atiriktaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1358: tadyaddhotrā yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa tadyatpañcātiriktā tasmātpañcacūḍāḥ 8.6.1.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:1361: ardhamu haitadātmano yanmithunaṃ yadā vai saha mithunenātha sarvo 'tha kṛtsnaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1364: ātmā vai nākasadaḥ prajā pañcacūḍā atiriktaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1365: vai tadātmano yatprajā yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1368: diśo vai nākasado diśa u eva
GV03sb_08_u:1369: pañcacūḍāstadyā amuṣmādādityādarvācyaḥ pañca diśastā nākasado yāḥ parācyastāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1370: pañcacūḍā atiriktā vai tā diśo yā amuṣmādādityātparācyo yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1374: imāṃlokānupariṣṭādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etāneṣāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1381: ayam puro harikeśa ityagnirvai purastadyattamāha pura iti
GV03sb_08_u:1382: prāñcaṃ hyagnimuddharanti prāñcamupacarantyatha yaddharikeśa ityāha haririva
GV03sb_08_u:1383: hyagniḥ sūryaraśmiriti sūryasyeva hyagne raśmayastasya rathagṛtsaśca rathaujāśca
GV03sb_08_u:1384: senānīgrāmaṇyāviti vāsantikau tāvṛtū puñjikasthalā ca kratusthalā cāpsarasāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1385: dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthiḥ senā ca tu te samitiśca daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavo hetiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1386: pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadvai senāyāṃ ca samitau ca'rtīyante daṅkṣṇavaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1387: paśavo hetiḥ pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadanyo 'nyaṃ ghnanti sa pauruṣeyo
GV03sb_08_u:1388: vadhaḥ prahetistebhyo namo astviti tebhya eva namaskaroti teno mṛḍayantviti ta
GV03sb_08_u:1389: evāsmai mṛḍayanti te yaṃ dviṣmo yaśca no dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhma iti
GV03sb_08_u:1390: yameva dveṣṭi yaścainaṃ dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhātyamumeṣāṃ jambhe
GV03sb_08_u:1391: dadhāmīti ha brūyādyaṃ dviṣyāttato 'ha tasminna punarastyapi tannādriyeta
GV03sb_08_u:1394: ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmetyayaṃ vai vāyurviśvakarmā yo 'yam
GV03sb_08_u:1395: pavata eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ karoti tadyattamāha dakṣiṇeti tasmādeṣa dakṣiṇaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1396: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vāti tasya rathasvanaśca rathecitraśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti graiṣmau
GV03sb_08_u:1397: tāvṛtū menakā ca sahajanyā cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthirime tu
GV03sb_08_u:1398: te dyāvāpṛthivī yātudhānā hetī rakṣāṃsi prahetiriti yātudhānā haivātra hetī rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:1401: ayam paścādviśvavyacā ityasau vā ādityo viśvavyacā yadā hyevaiṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1402: udetyathedaṃ sarvaṃ vyaco bhavati tadyattamāha paścāditi tasmādetam
GV03sb_08_u:1403: pratyañcameva yantam paśyanti tasya rathaprotaścāsamarathaśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1404: vārṣikau tāvṛtū pramlocantī cānumlocantī cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha
GV03sb_08_u:1405: māhitthirahorātre tu te te hi pra ca mlocato 'nu ca mlocato vyāghrā hetiḥ sarpāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1406: prahetiriti vyāghrā haivātra hetiḥ sarpāḥ prahetistebhyo namo astvititasyokto bandhuḥ 8.6.1.[19]
GV03sb_08_u:1410: yajñaṃ hi saṃyantītīdaṃ vasviti tasya tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1411: śāradau tāvṛtūviśvācī ca ghṛtācī cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha s māha
GV03sb_08_u:1412: māhitthirvediśca tu te srukca vedireva viśvācī srugghṛtācyāpo hetirvātaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1413: prahetirityāpo haivātra hetirvātaḥ prahetirato hyevoṣṇo vātyataḥ śītastebhyo namo

GV03sb_08_u:1806: hīme lokā aparimitālikhite dve raso haite citī aparimita u vai rasaḥ sarvāstveva
GV03sb_08_u:1810: madhyamāyāṃ citā upadadhyādantarikṣaṃ vai madhyamā citirantarikṣamu vai
GV03sb_08_u:1811: sarveṣām bhūtānāmāvapanamatho annaṃ vai yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā udaram madhyamā
GV03sb_08_u:1813: tadāhuḥ / nopadadhyānnedatirecayānīti sa vā upaiva dadhyātkāmebhyo vā etā iṣṭakā
GV03sb_08_u:1814: upadhīyante na vai kāmānāmatiriktamasti sa vai naivopadadhyādetāvadvā etaddevā
GV03sb_08_u:1820: prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānnam purīṣam prāṇe tadannaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1821: dadhāti tena sarvamātmānam pracādayati tammādyatprāṇe 'nnaṃ dhīyate
GV03sb_08_u:1826: sa vā aiva vapedannena vai prāṇā viṣṭabdhā yo vā annaṃ nātti saṃ vai tasya prāṇā

GV03sb_08_u:1838: hāsya tadaṅgaṃ nābhiprāpnuyādyadu vai prāṇo 'ṅgaṃ nābhiprāpnoti śuṣyati vā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1841: indraṃ hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni vardhayanti samudravyacasaṃ

GV03sb_08_u:1853: dyauśca saṃspṛṣṭe saṃspṛṣṭe hi vāyuśca dyauśca pūrvāṃ

GV03sb_08_u:1867: śociradha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇamastīti yadā vā etasya vāto 'nuvāti śocirathaitasya

GV03sb_08_u:1872: āyustasyaitatsadanamavata ityeṣa hīdaṃ sarvamavati cāyāyāmityetasya hīdaṃ sarvaṃ

GV03sb_08_u:1890: vyacasvatprathastaddivaṃ yaca divaṃ dṛṃha divam mā hiṃsīrityātmānaṃ yacātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1893: vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_08_u:1894: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1896: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetat 8.7.3.[20]
GV03sb_08_u:1898: nānā hi vāyuśca dyauśca sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti samānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1899: hyāyuśca prāṇaśca te vā ubhe eva śarkare bhavata ubhe svayamātṛṇe samānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1900: hyevāyuśca prāṇaścāthaine sūdadohasādhivadati prāṇo vai sūdadohāḥ prāṇeṇaivaine
GV03sb_08_u:1903: āpo vai sūdo 'nnaṃ dohaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnaya ityannaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1904: pṛśni janmandevānāmiti saṃvatsaro vai devānāṃ janma viśa iti yajño vai viśo yajñe hi

GV03sb_08_u:1913: te 'bruvan / upa tajjānīta yathaiṣu lokeṣu ramasupajīvanaṃ dadhāmeti te

GV03sb_08_u:1924: etāsu vyāhṛtiṣu gāyati bhūriti vā ayaṃ loko bhuva
GV03sb_08_u:1925: ityantarikṣalokaḥ svarityasau loka eṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ dadhāti 8.7.4.[6]

GV03sb_08_u:1946: parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅ tiṣṭhaṃstaddakṣiṇāvṛttaddhi devatrāthānuparītya paścātprāṅ
GV03sb_08_u:1949: sahasrasya pratimāsi sahasrasyonmāsi sāhasro 'si sahasrāya tveti
GV03sb_08_u:1950: sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvamasi sarvasmai tvetyetat 8.7.4.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:1952: ayameva lokaḥ prathamā citiḥ paśavaḥ purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1953: yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatīmaṃ tallokam paśubhiḥ pracādayati 8.7.4.[13]
GV03sb_08_u:1958: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣaṃ yattṛtīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1961: dakṣiṇāḥ purīṣaṃ yaccaturthī citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati

GV03sb_08_u:1974: purīṣaṃ yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1981: yaddvitīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetadasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ

GV03sb_08_u:1989: sarvasya prāṇā uttamāḥ purīṣa upadadhāti māṃsaṃ vai purīṣam māṃsena
